any help would be much appreciated

item.title: Making npcs talk aloud
item.dc:creator: @Wiplayer Wiplayer
item.description:
@Wiplayer wrote:

Open up NPCHandler.java.

Find:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 81 || npcs[i].npcType == 397 || npcs[i].npcType == 1766 || npcs[i].npcType == 1767 || npcs[i].npcType == 1768) {
						if (Misc.random2(50) == 1) {
							npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdate = "Moo";
						}
					}

Before that, add (add replace ID and TEXT with the npc id, and what you want to talk aloud)

if (npcs[i].npcType == ID) {
						if (Misc.random(100) == 1) {
							npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdate = "TEXT";
						}
					}

At least I think that should work.
